biography: Riku, brother of the esteemed Panu, is a golfer known for his thoughtful approach to the game. Riku is said to meticulously analyze each course before even setting foot on the green, charting potential hazards and favorable routes with the precision of a seasoned navigator.

Hailing from Kotojärven Kartanogolf, Riku has appeared once at the Hector Trophée. While he may not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, the golf world remembers his past participation.
Although Riku is considered retired from Hector events, one never knows if he will come out of retirement to participate in future events.
